page.title: 01GENERAL REVIEW OF BLOCK
page.content: {LANDSCAPE }A rolling rural landscape of patchworked fields bounded by well established tree studded hedgerows. {POPULATION }is sparse and scattered in isolated farms and small lineated communities. The block is within 5 or 6 miles of the market town of Shrewsbury. {AGRICULTURE}Dairy farming dominates the agricultural activity although arable, sheep, pig, poultry and mixed farms are to be found. {SMALL BUSINESS}Shop, garage, road haulage, Post Office, blacksmith. {HISTORICAL }Site of disused colliery and brickworks; site of Roman villa. {SPECIAL INTEREST}Butterfly World and Nox Blacksmith. {LIFE IN 1985}as seen through the eyes of a Headteacher, District Nurse, Vicar and other residents.
